subject: Re: running a single test method  out of 20 methods in my junittest  in eclipse
msgSnippet: Select the method node in the outline and choose Run As  JUnit Test , this should execute that test method only. cheers, AA ...
messageBody:
Select the method node in the outline and choose "Run As > JUnit Test", this should execute
that test method only.

cheers,
AA

--- In junit@yahoogroups.com, miro <miroconnect@...> wrote:
>
>
> I have a Junit test class which has 20 test methods.If I want to test a
> single test method is there a way .I run junit tests from eclipse , so is
> there any way in eclipse i can ask junit runner to run just one test method
> or few test methods and not all ?
> --
> View this message in context: http://www.nabble.com/running-a-single-test-method--
out-of-20-methods-in-my-junittest--in-eclipse--how-to---
tp19230663p19230663.html
> Sent from the JUnit - User mailing list archive at Nabble.com.
